title: Baby Carrier
description: dyed indigo background; three embroidered rectangular panels in blue or black with pink or light green highlights; panels separated by 1\" embroidered geometric bands; two additional large squares with embroidered open floral design in the same colors; blue lining; top open
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
